cz.syntea.xdef.sys

Class RegisterReportTables

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.sys.RegisterReportTables

  • public class RegisterReportTables
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides tools for generation Java class source registered table and for report tables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String... args)
      Create Java source class with registered reports from XML source file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Create Java source class with registered reports from XML source file. If output directory is not specified then the created source is stored to the same directory as XML source). The errors recognized while processing if input data are reported on given stream. If the stream is not specified it is set the System.err stream. The output file is generated in specified encoding. If encoding is not specified then it is used the default system character encoding.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments with following structure:

        Parameters: source -i input -o outDir [-p package] [-c encoding] [-r]

        -i -i input pathname(s) of property file(s) with report texts (the file name may contain wildcard characters).

        -o the directory where Java source with report tables are generated

        -p package name where tables will be generated. Default value is "cz.syntea.xdef.msg"

        -r: generate interface with registered identifiers of given table from input.

        -c encoding: character set name of output file (default is the system character set).

        -l ISO code of obligatory language of reports(default is "eng")

        -h: help.
